details.description: You must notify the British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS) If you move cattle onto or from your holding in Wales
details.will_continue_on: the British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS) website
details.licence_short_description: Tell the British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS) if you move cattle onto or from your holding in Wales.
details.licence_overview:
If you move cattle onto - or from - your holding, you must give notification of the movement to British Cattle Movement Service acting on behalf of Welsh Ministers either in writing, by phone or using the online Cattle Tracing System.

Notification must be made within 3 days of the movement.
